Hi, I'm Kevin

I am a Principal Cloud Architect specializing in Amazon Web Services with a specific focus on Infrastructure as Code (IaC) and automation. I am gradually learning Azure and Google Cloud Platform (GCP) experience to my resume, enjoying the challenges of being proficient across a broad range of technologies.
